document.full_text: joseph brooks, the oscar-winning composer of the hit "you light up my life" and who was awaiting trial on rape charges, was found dead in his new york apartment on sunday having apparently killed himself, police said.
document.title: oscar-winning composer accused of rape found dead
lines_and_colors: joseph brooks, the oscar-winning composer of the hit "you light up my life" and who was awaiting trial on rape charges, was found dead in his new york apartment on sunday having apparently killed himself, police said.
